description: '''Cleveland punk''' was a [[proto-punk]] and [[punk rock]] music scene in [[Cleveland, Ohio]], during the 1970s. Its early bands included [[Mirrors (Ohio band)|Mirrors]], [[Electric Eels (band)|Electric Eels]], [[the Styrenes]], [[Rocket from the Tombs]]. Notable punk rock bands that emerged included [[Pere Ubu]], [[the Pagans]], and [[Dead Boys]].
